definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
the sound of the wind/to soar

sentences.english: A cowboy in Jordan, Montana rounds up bucking broncos.
sentences.chinese: 一名蒙大拿州樛登市的牛仔在趕攏北美洲野馬。

definition: King Huiwen of Qin 秦國|秦国, ruled 338-211 BC during the Warring States Period
Emperor Xuan (91-48 BC) of the Former Han Dynasty, reigned 74-48 BC
Yuan Emperor, reign name of Han Dynasty emperor Liu Shi 劉奭|刘奭[Liu2 Shi4], (74-33 BC), reigned 48-33 BC
Qin Ershi (229-207 BC), second Qin emperor
surname Cheng/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BCE) vassal state
Lao Ai (-238 BC), man of Qin famous for his giant penis/in fiction, bogus eunuch and the consort of king Ying Zheng's mother lady Zhao
Duke Mu of Qin, the first substantial king of Qin (ruled 659-621 BC), sometimes considered one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸
